meaningMnemonic: The <radical>bamboo</radical> <radical>temple</radical> is <kanji>equal</kanji> to all of the other non-bamboo temples. Just because it's made of bamboo doesn't make it any less special and spiritual.
readingMnemonic: The bamboo temple is also an <kanji>equal</kanji> distance away from the other temples in <reading>とう</reading>きょう. When you look at a map of とうきょう temples, you can measure them out and they'll all be perfectly equal.
